p: Samples of CSF in which virus was detected by D-RT-PCR were submitted to sequencing analysis according to the method of Sanger. The sequencing reaction was performed using the kit ABI PRISM BigDye Terminator Cycle Sequencing Ready Reaction (Applied Biosystems, Life Technologies, Carlsbad, California, United States) according to the manufacturer's instructions. Sequencing was completed using the Genetic Analyzer ABI 3100 (Applied Biosystems, Life Technologies, Carlsbad, California, U.S).
